titleStmt.title: A royal prophecy, written long since concerning the Kings restauration to his crown in 1660.
titleStmt.author: Facidicus Possiblis.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for H.B. at the Gun in Ivy-Lane,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "HOld out brave Charles, for thou shalt win the Field ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
